message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a competitive price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, $140 is a bit higher than my budget. I'd be willing to pay $105 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $125
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $125 is still a bit high for me.  How about we settle on $115?  That's a fair price for both of us.
I'm glad we're close, Bob. I can do $122, but that's as low as I can go. I need to make sure I'm covering my costs
